item.title: Alferd
item.author: hussienmisbah11@gmail.com (0xMesbaha)
item.description: In this room, we’ll learn how to exploit a common misconfiguration on a widely used automation server(Jenkins - This tool is used to create continuous integration/continuous development pipelines that allow developers to automatically deploy their code once they made change to it). After which, we’ll use an interesting privilege escalation method to get full system access.
